textBeforeTable: Model Measurements FIT: True to US sizing. Size & Fit THIS ITEM CANNOT BE SHIPPED OUTSIDE THE USA. Platform: 0.5in / 12mm Heel: 4in / 100mm MEASUREMENTS This item cannot be gift-boxed. Imported, China. Leather: Snakeskin. An embroidered geometric pattern over sheer mesh lends soft texture to peep-toe 10 Crosby Derek Lam booties. The oxford-inspired silhouette is styled with snakeskin trim, and gains comfortable lift with a chunky heel and slim platform. Lace-up closure. Leather sole. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer A three-time CFDA award winner and Parsons graduate, Derek Lam spent twelve years in the industry before launching his eponymous label in 2003. In 2011, he launched his diffusion line, Derek Lam 10 Crosby. Named after the location of his first store and headquarters, the line is inspired by the cool, downtown New York girls the designer spots in the neighborhood.
